name: Space Shooter (Studio Retro Pulse)
description:
Be the captain of your own ship as you explore the galaxy, chasing down a hostile alien race. Space Shooter is all about unique and fun gameplay so forget about the weird graphics, lazy storyline and my lack of musical skill.

Explore 8 foreign planets each with cool features, groovy music and bosses.

Gain strength by finding secrets and hidden ship modules giving shields, rockets and different types of weapons!

Customize and upgrade your ship with prize money you earn from kicking enemy butt- I mean destroying enemies...

Important changes in version 1.4:

  • Gameplay Improvements:
    • Shoot while strafing!
    • Nerfed higher tier enemies!
    • Initial stats increased and maxes for stats decreased.
  • Level and Boss changes/improvements.
  • More customization colors!
  • Ship colors can now be customized
  • Added a new multiplayer map!
